serverSide.entities

Class RefereeSiteClientProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • serverSide.entities.RefereeSiteClientProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoachCloning, RefereeCloning, java.lang.Runnable

    public class RefereeSiteClientProxy
extends java.lang.Thread
implements RefereeCloning, CoachCloning
    Service provider agent for access to the Referee Site.

    Implementation of the client-server model type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    • Nested Class Summary
